thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Mr. Clay Bolton
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. Clay Bolton

author: Mr. Clay Bolton
title: Mr. Clay Bolton
text:
Our representative Harry was both knowledgeable and extremely helpful. He truly worked hard to find us a competitive air fare and to find flight schedules that best fit our needs/requirements. He was also incredibly patient and helpful in answering the many questions and particulars concerning our upcoming travel plans. He truly earned his "stripes" with his most excellent service.
I would most certainly recommend (and use) this service again and at any time in the future.
